C

com.optit - package com.optit
 
com.optit.execute - package com.optit.execute

D

databaseType - Static variable in class com.optit.Parameters
 
debug - Static variable in class com.optit.Parameters
 

E

Executor - Class in com.optit.execute
The executor class is responsible to establish the data source to the database, run the SQLReader to parse the sql file and start/stop the test execution threads.
Executor(Properties) - Constructor for class com.optit.execute.Executor
This constructor creates a new Executor instance
ExecutorThread - Class in com.optit.execute
The ExecutorThread is a thread having one connection to the database It will generate load against the database until the volatile stop flag is set via the stop() method
ExecutorThread(Connection, LinkedList<String>, boolean) - Constructor for class com.optit.execute.ExecutorThread
Creates a new ExecutorThread object

G

getFullName() - Method in class com.optit.execute.ExecutorThread
Returns the fully qualified thread name (name + id)

H

handleExceptions(Exception) - Static method in class com.optit.SimpleLoadGenerator
This function sits on the top level and catches all exceptions and prints out proper error messages
